effect.diamond_pearl: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.platinum: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: At the end of the next turn, user will be healed for half its max HP. If the user is switched out, its replacement will be healed instead for half of the user’s max HP. If the user faints or is forcefully switched by roar or whirlwind, this effect will not activate.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
short_effect.platinum: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User will recover half its max HP at the end of the next turn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP in the next turn.
flavor_text.platinum: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP in the next turn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A self-healing move. The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP in the next turn.
